title: The HOT CHIP Challenge! + Amy Denied Merchandise Return Due To COVID + Miranda Lambert On Her Shirtless Husband In Music Video
itunes:title: The HOT CHIP Challenge! + Amy Denied Merchandise Return Due To COVID + Miranda Lambert On Her Shirtless Husband In Music Video
description:
It’s about to be a BAD day for someone as we spin the wheel and find out who has to eat the HOTTEST CHIP IN THE WORLD! Amy got an email that made her say “WHAAAT?!?!”...when she learned she can’t return something because of COVID. Plus, we talk with Miranda Lambert about her new music video, touring in her Airstream and her new role in the "Make It Up As We Go" podcast!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
